description:
Ushabati holding hoe in each hand, yoke laid across hands, basket for grain hanging at each end of yoke.  Inscription in horizontal rows. \'To illuminate the Osiris Rames\'(Ramses?)  He says Ushabati - - \'The conventional formula, well cut.  A very good Ushabati, probably of XVIII or XIX Dynasty. \'RA-MOSE\'     H. 10-1/4 in.

carries two hoes and bar with bags of grain
 
He does farm work for death.
title: Ushabti
